alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Haskell; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 5:27PM CDT until September 10 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KEARNY...SOUTHWESTERN FINNEY...NORTHEASTERN GRANT AND NORTHERN HASKELL COUNTIES... At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Plymell, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ryus and Plymell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
